description.brief: Dish states generated from a receiver node are sent here for spike and burst detection.

package.description: burst_calc is a ROS package for detecting bursts of spiking activity in a neural network. A center of activity trajectory (CAT) is calculated for each burst which is then forwarded to a dish teleop node to facilitate ARM movement. The package consists of a burst creator node, a CAT creator node, and several helper classes. This package relies on the other packages in the arm_project stack to perform properly.
package.author: Jonathan Hasenzahl
